content.para: The 3.5.0 release introduces a new physics-inspired tree map visualization called FoamTree, the bisecting k-means clustering algorithm and a number of smaller improvements and bug fixes.

td.p: unit tests are now based on the RandomizedTesting project.
Small bug fixes in Lingo and STC clustering algorithms.

BingDocumentSource has been removed and replaced with Bing3DocumentSource, which uses Windows Azure Search API. The new implementation does not come with hardcoded API key any more, you need to obtain your own API key to use it.
As Google Desktop has been discontinued, GoogleDesktopDocumentSource has been removed. Further releases will likely provide an alternative.
Part of internals responsible for binding attribute values to component instances has been extracted to a separate project.

tr.td: Direct links to PubMed article overviews

td.p: The PubMed document source now provides links to PubMed overviews of the articles.

tr.td:
A number of dependencies have been updated:
High Performance Primitive Collections to version 0.4.1
Google Guava to version r12
SimpleXML to version 2.6.3
Morfologik to version 1.5.3
Lucene to version 3.6.0
Ehcache removed

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.6.0. For more new features, please see release 3.5.0 and release 3.4.0 notes.
